General.Name: Wuhan Huakang Century Medical Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Wuhan Huakang Century Medical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, implementation, operation, and maintenance of medical purification integrated systems in China and internationally. It also sells medical equipment and consumables. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.
General.Address: No. 77, Optics Valley Avenue, Wuhan, China, 430000
